title: dhana gaNapatiyE vA vA
sahitya:
dhana gaNapatiyE vA vA sheyyum tavangaL palittiDa tannaruL tA tA


anupallavi

  manamalar tannil unnai vaittu nAn pUjittEn makarinil yAril un mahimaiyai vAsittEn


caraNam    karimukha OmkAra kaNmaNiyE kalai ellAm tandiDum viNmaNiyE
ParivuDan karuNai pAlikkum sutanE para asukham tandaruL parashivan maghanE
